text: :This article discusses the Green Day song. For the phrase itself, see Nice guys finish last. "Nice Guys Finish Last" was a single released by the American punk band Green Day's fifth album Nimrod. ==Track listing== AU Single: #Nice Guys Finish Last #Good Riddance (Time of Your Life) #The Grouch (Live) #She (Live) ==Chart Positions== Year Chart Position 1998 US Modern Rock Tracks 31 Category:1999 songs Category:Green Day songs
title: Nice Guys Finish Last
